short_summary: Analysis of Commercial Fishing License, Quota, and Vessel Values 2022
description: Request for Proposal (RFP) Notice for Analysis of Commercial Fishing License, Quota, and Vessel Values 2022. Fisheries and Oceans Canada is seeking a contractor to gather and analyze data on commercial fishing licenses, quotas, and vessel values. The objective is to inform license retirement and reallocation programs, gauge and track the economic health of the fishing industry, develop policies around license redistribution and First Nation participation, estimate the impacts of policy decisions on the Pacific Fishery, and estimate potential treaty impacts on the commercial fishery.

full_summary:
**Procurement Number**
------------------;

PN PW-22-01014945 / 30003429

**Project Description**
----------------;

Analysis of Commercial Fishing License, Quota, and Vessel Values 2022

**Project Overview**
----------------;

The Contractor will be required to perform a comprehensive analysis of commercial fishing licenses, quota, and vessel values in the Pacific commercial fishery for the calendar year 2022. The analysis will provide valuable insights and information to inform license retirement and reallocation programs, gauge and track the economic health of the fishing industry, and develop policies around license redistribution and First Nation participation.

**Scope of Work**
----------------;

1.0 General Requirements:
1.1 The Contractor must perform valuations on Pacific fishing licenses and quota that can be transferred.
1.2 The Contractor must perform valuations for each group in each license category, including vessels.
* Full fee licenses
* Reduced fee licenses where they exist
* Quota values where they exist
* Lease value where they exist

**Methodology**
-------------

The Contractor must employ a consistent methodology to ensure continuity in valuation, taking into account changes in market values and the development of new markets.

**Security Requirements**
-------------------------

None

**Trade Agreements**
------------------

The requirement is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization-Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contract Details**
--------------------

* Contract duration: From date of award to March 31, 2023
* One (1) option period of one (1) year at the discretion of the Department

**Contact Information**
----------------------

Please direct any inquiries regarding this procurement to:

Terri Jones
Contracting Authority
Phone: 506-461-3743
Email: [Terri.Jones@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:Terri.Jones@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)

**Procurement Documents**
-------------------------

The tender documentation can be downloaded from the following URL:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca
